name: Pills Runner
description:
Play as a mystical ancient god of primordial evil who manipulates an depressed middle-class manager with chemically-induced gratification.

    Feed them with pills to run faster and avoid falling over, but beware of moving your pawn too close to your body.  Make them survive long enough to be rewarded with 'gifts', that warp their body into unthinkable shapes.

    Mobile runner with a few interesting mechanics. Slide bar controls the speed of office worker. If bar in red sight, worker goes closer to monster, if blue - it slowes down him. Also each head has defect, so level-up it's actualy punishment.

    Would be coul if you leave some comments, feedback. So

    Just play a little, and enjoy.
